thread.section_title: Shipito Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Shipito | www.shipito.com
thread.title: Peerapat Umpaivit

author: Peerapat Umpaivit
title: Peerapat Umpaivit
text:
beware when you use their service. when package lost , they doesn't help you al all. they don't claim for you. they don't give you authorization to claim with courier either. all i ask is a paper of authorization so that i can claim with fedex myself.
i used shipito service more than 5 years since they start business. they used to be good but now ... i suspect they stole customer products.
i suggest everyone don't ever use their sevice. who used it now , please change company.
